summary: The diff implements all three requirements: REQ-1 (arrival date default to today in CaseFormDialog), REQ-2 (Daily Summary task option in both CaseFormDialog and CaseEditDialog with workflow icon support), and REQ-3 (CaseCard always fully expanded with rounded rectangle layout, no collapse toggle). Evidence is present across CaseFormDialog.tsx, CaseEditDialog.tsx, CaseCard.tsx, and checklist.ts (referenced in file summaries).
